aws_region.description: AWS region to deploy resources in.

private_subnet_cidrs.description: List of CIDR blocks for private subnets.

public_subnet_cidrs.description: List of CIDR blocks for public subnets.

renovatebot_schedule_expression.description: (Optional) Schedule expression for running RenovateBot (e.g., cron). Leave empty to run as a service.

renovatebot_secret_arn.description: ARN of the Secrets Manager secret containing renovate.json.

renovatebot_task_cpu.description: CPU units for the RenovateBot ECS task.

renovatebot_task_memory.description: Memory (in MiB) for the RenovateBot ECS task.
